'''Folco Burrowes'''<ref name="burrowes">''[[The Return of the Shadow]]'' lists the spelling as "Burrowes" not "Burrows"</ref> was one of [[Frodo]]'s lawyers in ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]'' (at that stage of the writing Frodo was called Bingo). Folco, along with Bingo's other lawyer, [[Iago Grubb]], eject [[Sancho Proudfoot]] as he tries to excavate the pantry at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref name="Shadow">{{RS|1Iiii}}</ref>
